attributes.action: Scrap the current London 2012 Olympics Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This "logo" is insulting to all Londoners, sportsmen and women, and Olympians. Even Interactive Olympics editor Claire Stocks said on the BBC that its "not about sport, London, or even the Olympics". It is hideous and should be re-thought out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
